categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Blue Nine" was an individual who served as a pilot in the Resistance as a member of Blue Squadron. During the Resistance's war with the First Order, Blue Nine participated in the Battle of Starkiller Base. During the battle, Blue Nine was saved from a pair of seekers when Ello Asty redirected the missile.
Blue Nine is mentioned in Ello Asty's Tales of Valor profile in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: On the Front Lines, written by Daniel Wallace.
